alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dare County through 845 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Point Harbor to near Rose Bay. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Southern Shores, Nags Head, Manteo, Colington, Whalebone, Duck Coe Pier, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wright Brothers National Monument, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Avalon Pier, Wanchese, Bodie Island Lighthouse and Outer Banks Fishing Pier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
